name: Multi-LLM Prompt Processor and Synthesizer
description:
This tool enhances prompt results by querying multiple LLMs with a single prompt. It then uses a final "synthesizer" LLM to analyze all the individual responses and craft one superior, comprehensive answer that combines the best elements of each.

## How to Use

1.  Set the `processing_mode` to `parallel` (faster, staggered start) or 'sequential' (if using multiple local models).
2.  List the processing LLMs, using their Shinkai IDs (e.g., `shinkai_free_trial, gpt_5_mini, gemini_2_5_pro`).
3.  Choose a powerful synthesizer LLM in `default_synthesizer_LLM` to create the final answer, using its Shinkai ID (e.g., `shinkai_free_trial').
4. Provide your prompt in the `user_prompt` input.
author: @@official.shinkai

default_prompt_processing_LLMs.description: Comma-separated list of default LLMs for prompt processing, using their Shinkai IDs (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial, gpt_5, gemini_2_5_pro').

default_synthesizer_LLM.description: Default LLM for synthesizing the results, using its Shinkai ID (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial').

processing_mode.description: Mode for processing prompts: 'parallel' or 'sequential'. In 'parallel' mode, use only 1 local model. Use 'sequential' mode when using multiple local models. Default : parallel.

show_individual_answers.description: Whether to include individual answers from processing LLMs in the output. Default : false.

additional_instructions.description: Additional instructions to include in the synthesis prompt, to further guide the synthesizer towards the type of final answer you would like.

user_prompt.description: The main user prompt to process with the LLMs.

prompt_processing_LLMs.description: Optional override for processing LLMs, comma-separated, using their Shinkai IDs (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial, gpt_5_mini').

synthesizer_LLM.description: Optional override for the synthesizer LLM, using its Shinkai ID (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial').

failed_calls.description: Details of any failed LLM calls.

final_synthesized_answer.description: The final synthesized answer combining the best elements from processing LLMs.

intermediary_individual_answers.description: Individual responses from processing LLMs, if requested.

processing_llms.description: List of LLMs used for initial processing.
